title: What are some ways to carry yourself gracefully? - Quora

response.answer_text: Accentuate the positive, eliminate the negative, and don't mess with Mr. Inbetween. Posture, equanimity, table manners, appropriate attire, courtesy, helpfulness, cordiality, and responsiveness light up a room more now than ever. Congeniality: Attempt to lose every debate and learn something from every new acquaintance.  Remaining silent whenever possible, and sitting still, forces everyone you meet to assume you are a genius.  Every single person looks more attractive when smiling. Avoid eating and drinking in public. Because: Entropy. If you must, work slowly with tiny bites. Never speak before clearing your mouth with a drink. Flee from inebriated or obnoxious people. In photos, anything but crossing your legs makes you look like a slut. Also clenching your hands makes you look angry. Male or female — children and the elderly go first. Offering an arm to the unsteady reveals a halo over your head to everyone in sight. Learn mnemonics to remember names, and shamelessly exploit that superpower. If you forget a name, never fake it. Asking for it immediately is almost as complimentary as remembering it.
